name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: Shanghai Jiaotong University deleted the descriptions such as "required by the regulator" and "notified by the superior" in the notice

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 4, the "New York Democracy Wall" held a memorial service for the 35th anniversary of June 4 at Liu Xiaobo's bench in New York's Central Park.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the China Fire and Rescue Academy held a meeting to announce that it would cancel the nearly 1,000 yuan monthly meal allowance for students, which led to complaints from students on the forum. It is reported that the students' allowance has not been paid for a year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/ocOGUAy2vj

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Do you know how much money our country has wasted on the road of "informatization" and "localization"?

content:
Discussion on V2ex about large model filing and review.
Individuals should not consider domestic AI development

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 7, it was reported online that an employee of NetEase's "Egg Party" died suddenly after working overtime until 2 a.m.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 4, Yizhou, Shanxi. Yizhou Yulongting real estate project reduced its price, and old owners defended their rights at the sales office.
It is reported that the project was previously priced at 11,000 yuan per square meter, and was positioned as a high-end community. Due to the failure of the real estate company's investment, it decided to reduce the price. The average price of buildings 34-39 in the community was changed to 7,500 yuan per square meter, which caused dissatisfaction among the owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 5, Guangdong. An e-commerce company selling children's shoes posted a video saying that it encountered a large number of returns after the Children's Day. Many parents returned the shoes after their children participated in the Children's Day activities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 5, Weibo announced that a big V was banned for "hyping up the number of suicides in various provinces across the country," and another big V was banned for "spreading attacks on the system, badmouthing economic development, and triggering harmful comments."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 6, Yongzhou, Hunan. A private car was dragged for hundreds of meters with a law enforcement officer on top.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 5, in Qianguan Town, Yunfu, Guangdong, a man not in uniform got into an argument with a vendor next to an urban management law enforcement vehicle, then pushed the vendor to the ground, causing the back of his head to hit the ground heavily.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 5, during a march in support of Palestine in New York, some participants waved the flag of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Due to the controversy over how to tie the red scarf, the Liaocheng Communist Youth League was criticized by netizens
Recently, the Liaocheng Communist Youth League in Shandong Province released a video teaching everyone how to tie a red scarf. Netizens pointed out that the way to tie the red scarf in the video was similar to the triangular scarf on Japanese sailor uniforms, and questioned whether the Communist Youth League was infiltrated by Japanese spies.
As of now, the Liaocheng Communist Youth League has closed the comment area of the account

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Without free speech, there can be no free code.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 6, Guangxi. Netizens said, "The property management company organized a zongzi-making activity for the Dragon Boat Festival, and the materials were sold out in seconds as soon as they were put on the shelves."
June 6, Hunan. The property management company organized a zongzi-making activity, but the scene turned into a "zongzi-grabbing competition" as residents swarmed to grab the glutinous rice leaves.
June 6, Chongqing. The community organized a zongzi-making activity for the Dragon Boat Festival. The photographer said that 4 barrels of rice were instantly snatched away by the aunties.
June 6, Anhui. "The property management company organized a zongzi-making activity for the Dragon Boat Festival, and the materials were sold out in seconds within three minutes of being put on the shelves."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hu Xijin made a statement on the incident

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 7, in Harbin, Heilongjiang, an explosion occurred at a store at the entrance of Guoyuan Xingcheng Community in Xiangfang District.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Heze, Shandong. The first candidate to walk out of the examination room in Dongming County showed the Palestinian flag to the public.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Neijiang, Sichuan Province recently announced that it would streamline the city-level administrative establishment by 3%.
According to reports, Shanxi, Henan, and Gannan, Gansu Province all disclosed the proportion of local administrative establishment streamlining this year, ranging from 2% to 5%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 4 (Release) Beijing. A passenger complained to 12345 about the high commission rate of the online car-hailing platform. The passenger paid 243 yuan, and the driver only received 138 yuan. 
12345 responded that this was the platform's self-management behavior. If the driver thinks the platform's share is unreasonable, it is recommended to switch to other platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The pregnant woman has died.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 7, students from the Oral Hygiene School in Yuncheng City, Shanxi Province, took to the streets to protest for their rights.
It is reported that the Oral Hygiene School in Yuncheng City violated regulations in recruiting students and sending them to Henan Province to take the college entrance examination. As a result, the students were unable to take the college entrance examination because they did not have admission tickets. The students who were sent back that day took to the streets to protest for justice

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 6, CCTV reported that the All-China Federation of Trade Unions recently allocated 955 million yuan in funds to help workers in need, focusing on solving their most urgent problems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Taiyuan, Shanxi. Owners of Zhongtie Nord City complained that the developer only built buildings but did not repair roads, causing residents to walk on narrow paths every day to and from get off work. Owners defended their rights at the sales office and shouted in unison, "Zhongtie, build roads! Zhongtie, build roads!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 6, Jinzhou, Liaoning. Jinxiu Longwan Bathhouse owed workers wages, and workers were outside the store demanding their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 6, in Huaihua, Hunan, migrant workers held a sit-in in front of the Huaihua Hecheng District Government with banners to demand their wages, asking the government to act on behalf of the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 7, in Meizhou, Guangdong, residents of Guotian Town, Wuhua County, hung banners on the roof and knelt on the edge of the roof to protest against forced demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Xingtai, Hebei. The Meijing Garden building project did not deliver the houses, so the owners jumped off the building to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Handan, Hebei. The Qilin Fudi real estate project in Guantao County was left unfinished, and the owners jumped off the building to defend their rights, including the family members of the martyrs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 7, Heilongjiang. Rights activists shouted “See the president” outside the Heilongjiang Provincial High People’s Court

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 4, Guizhou. China Railway Yunhe Spring real estate project has been unfinished for four years and has not yet been capped. On that day, the owners went to the sales office to protest their rights, and many were pinned down and arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After an employee of NetEase's "Egg Party" died suddenly from overwork, the department held an emergency internal meeting to record the news

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 7, it was reported online that a serious violation occurred in the examination room of the Second Affiliated Middle School of Beijing Capital Normal University on the first day of the college entrance examination. The bell for the Chinese language test rang five minutes before the end of the test. Afterwards, the students were detained in the examination room for 40 minutes, given one minute to answer questions, and were required to sign a promise that they had no objection to the process of the test.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 35th anniversary of June 4th, we collaborated with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humane China @HChina89 to release a series of June 4th special photos from the scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement on the 26th (June 7)
[Martial law soldiers were shot dead, 1 killed and 3 injured] [Incidences of lying on rails to protest across the country are frequent]
On the fourth day of martial law, at 10 a.m. that day, a group of soldiers were driving near the Jianguomen Overpass when they were shot at from two directions, the Diplomatic Apartments outside Jianguomen and the Lunan Building. One soldier was killed and three were injured. As if facing a formidable enemy, the martial law troops fired warning shots for more than 15 minutes at the Diplomatic Apartments in Qijiayuan, the residences of foreign journalists, the Friendship Store, and the International Building housing many foreign companies. They also cordoned off the embassy area and conducted searches inside. This move triggered strong protests from the United States and Japan, and the martial law troops subsequently withdrew in order to avoid causing international trouble.
There were still frequent protests in Beijing that day. In the early morning of that day, a reporter from Hong Kong's "Economic Daily" was in Beijing...
fullContent:
六四35周年，与中國人權@hrichina、人道中國@HChina89合作发布一系列六四专题图片八九民运现场之二十六（6月7日）
【戒严士兵遭放冷枪1死3伤】【全国卧轨抗议事件频传】
戒严部队军管第四天，当天上午10 点，一队士兵乘车路经建国门立交桥附近时，遭到来自建国门外外交公寓和路南楼上两个方向的枪击，大兵1死3伤。戒严部队如临大敌，向齐家园外交官公寓、外国新闻记者住处、友谊商店及设有多处外国企业的国际大楼，做了十五分钟以上的警示扫射，并封锁使馆区，入内搜查。此举引来美国和日本等强烈抗议，为避免引发国际事端，戒严部队随后撤离。
北京当天仍然频现抗议事件。当天凌晨，香港《经济日报》记者在北京火车站对面的国际饭店目睹，当一群抗议市民在拆除南礼士路南口的公安岗亭时，遭戒严部队开枪镇压，当场枪杀4人，并抓捕了两个抗议者。
多天未有消息的“北京高自联”和“北大筹委会”，当天也贴出《空校宣言》，并通过北大28楼广播台，在傍晚广播了“告全市人民书”，号召从6月9日中午12时起，举行全市总罢工、总罢市、总罢课、总罢教。清华大学“学生自治会”的广播台，也不断播出抗议，因为校方把他们设在主楼悼念死难同学的的横幅、黑纱收走。
全国方面，多地发生卧轨事件，令各地的铁路交通中断，包括多达10列旅客列车停发。而在武汉，抗议者在长江大桥南端的引桥上，把一根大铁轨搬到铁路轨道上拦截列车，使当地京广铁路干线中断达10小时。广州当天也发生数万市民堵塞珠江大桥的抗议行动。
上海方面，由于火车撞死6人事件，令市民情绪更加火上加油，当天5万多市民举行大游行，到上海市政府抗议。
另一方面，当天上午戒严部队指挥部邀请一批中国官方记者到天安门广场采访，试图通过喉舌来证明戒严部队在清场过程中没有开枪，但中央电视台当晚播出的采访中，出现了一个特写镜头：人民英雄纪念碑上弹痕累累。

图片说明：
1，一辆满载士兵的卡车经过街头，有市民躲在汽车后以防士兵扫射。2，镇压过后，一些市民展示他们在街头拾到的弹殻。3，燕京饭店的外墙上留下密集的弹孔。4，数万广州学生和市民在珠江大桥一侧抗议北京镇压学运。
